dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4574 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 108 West Schick Road in Bloomingdale, Illinois, as the “Bloomingdale Veterans Memorial Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Krishnamoorthi (for himself, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, Ms. Kelly of Illinois, Mr. Hultgren, Mr. Roskam, Mr. Quigley, Mr. Bost, Mr. Kinzinger, Mr. Foster, Mr. Rush, Mr. Schneider, Mrs. Bustos, Mr. Lipinski, Mr. LaHood, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Shimkus, and Mr. Gutiérrez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 108 West Schick Road in Bloomingdale, Illinois, as the Bloomingdale Veterans Memorial Post Office Building.

section.header: Bloomingdale Veterans Memorial Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 108 West Schick Road in Bloomingdale, Illinois, shall be known and designated as the Bloomingdale Veterans Memorial Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Bloomingdale Veterans Memorial Post Office Building.
